nodes.title: Use "extends TreeNode" to fix compilaton with javac 1.8.0_144
Fix the DEB postrm script to delete the logisim-evolution command line tool
Make package task to pick up the correct icon file on Windows.
Add package task to ant build.xml
Fix compilation error due to unknown class ScaledOptionPane
Replace rsyntaxtextarea.jar with maven central rsyntaxtextarea.
Merge hex paste bug fix of Kevin Walsh
Merged several enhancements of Kevin Walsh into evolution for the RAM and ROM components
Big overhaul of RAM and ROM components
partial adaptation of the documentation to Version 3.2
Moved to utf-8 formatted property files as it is now standard supported

fixed Auto-pan while wiring or placing components #255
Added first set of documentation, and added a jtag uart component to the soc library
Implemented the complete framework to assemble and disassemble

Riscv SOC simulation library (work in progress)
Fixed kHz vs KHz bug in the resting code base.
Almost all icons used in logisim are now self-drawing (=scalable) icons
Various bug fixes, introduction of self-drawing icons and removal of the "Base" library from the project explorer
Cleaned up property files, and ordered them alfabetically
Small bugfix on push from mbaillif and added multi-language for french
Format and translation & Restoring accents lost \uxxxx
Merged wire bug fixes from Kevin Walsh

As the "scaled" icons are really looking ugly, all gates and the pins now draw their icon themselves. The advantage is now also that the correct icon will be displayed for the "old" pin symbols and the "new" ones. Fixed also a small bug in the tikz generator.
Changed default to unsigned for divider
Tikz exporter and svg exporter. Answers to issue #102

Merged the latest updates from Kevin Walsh on the analyzer. This should make evolution in sync with holycross. Evolution has solved some details differently from holycross, being: 1) Kmaps with upto 6 inputs, and the function rendering is solved differently.
Merged all of Kevin Walsh's pushes upto the rewrite of the chronogram
Added two pushes of Kevin Walsh and fixed bug #243
Fixed some bugs and pin apearance for south and north
